title: HS Lookup
intro: This is a tool I made for the Blizzard game, Hearthstone. It allows players to quickly look up cards by mana cost and see their average health and attack values. Built in React.

title: TFT Tool
intro: This is a tool I made for Teamfight Tactics by Riot Games. It helps the player choose your team by showing you possible synergies. Made for mobile. Built in React.
